TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VerticalAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment for visual style elements with a fixed size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The VerticalAlignment values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment Bottom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The element is aligned to the bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment Center = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The element is aligned to the top.
